tags: i have such wildly different feelings about each of sam's characters
summary: slowburn, fake date, enemies to lovers, Scanlan, Taryon, Nott
question: slowburn, fake date, enemies to lovers, Scanlan, Taryon, Nott
answer:
Definitely Fake Date Taryon because even if my gender is complicated, I don’t know if it’s sufficiently complicated for me to be Tary’s type. (And he’s nowhere near mine, for that matter, much as I love him.) Also while I’m sure Scanlan would also be heaps of fun to fake date, I think it’d be far more mutually enjoyable to be over-dramatic in romantic tropage with Tary.

Enemies to lovers with Scanlan because that’s actually pretty close to how my actual feelings about Scanlan developed. There’d be lots of arguments over magical ethics.

Which leaves Nott to slow-burn which I can 100% get behind as long as Yeza’s okay with it. Slow-burn OT3 is my jam, though. Also I Nott is very much still on a journey of self-discovery and self-acceptance and I feel like rushing into a new relationship in the midst of that is not a great idea.

summary: A Pikelan song. A long gray silence had ambled down the coast You drew in sand all the things we'd miss the most Little love,...
caption:
A Pikelan song.

A long gray silence had ambled down the coast
You drew in sand all the things we’d miss the most

Little love, little love 

Little love, little love 

Little love, little love 

I hope we die here when we’re old

summary: For the fandom ask meme: Critical Role
question: For the fandom ask meme: Critical Role
answer:
• Favorite Male Character: Fjord.
  • Favorite Female Character: Nott. 
  • Least Favorite Character: Yasha and it’s not her fault. She’s like a non-character unfortunately because Ashley isn’t there.
  • Favorite Ship: Fjordmauk. 
  • Favorite Friendship: Molly and Yasha
  • Favorite Quote: I’m not going to lie a lot of stuff has really gotten me but I remember very few exact quotes. The only quote I recall relatively vividly is “The purple one will cut you from navel to nuts, do not fuck us.” so thanks Caleb. 
  • Worst Character Death (if any): Molly or Avantika.
  • This made me so happy you have no idea Moment: It’s a tie between Fjord getting pegged and the drinking contest in Hupperdook. 
  • Saddest Moment: Both times at Molly’s grave.
  • Favorite Location: Hupperdook

  • Favorite Friendship: Molly and Yasha
  • Favorite Quote: I’m not going to lie a lot of stuff has really gotten me but I remember very few exact quotes. The only quote I recall relatively vividly is “The purple one will cut you from navel to nuts, do not fuck us.” so thanks Caleb.

  • Saddest Moment: Both times at Molly’s grave.
  • Favorite Location: Hupperdook

tags: It’s funny to me that Molly would have been part of the latter group while the audience probably would want him to be part of the former
summary: Musings on Character Motivations
body:
Musings on Character Motivations

Maybe it’s obvious after 60 episodes to everyone but one thing that I find inadvertently good about the M9 is that there is a good mix of characters who are trying to push it forward versus get over it/get it back in terms of motivations for traveling. Obviously it’s a mix of both for everyone but for Caleb, Nott, and Yasha their main purpose has been directly tied back to a major event in their past that they need to overcome and/or accept. Compared to Jester, Cad, and Beau who are out on a new journey/mission. This leaves Fjord who I think is an interesting case because I think it’s been more a balance between the two. He wants to discover his power for the sake of power and new knowledge but also he knows what is happening is directly tied to a mystery in his past that he wants to solve. It’s a shame during his pirate arc we couldn’t get more info on the latter.

I’m glad it worked out like this as it makes for a good mix to keep things moving and provide ways exciting and organic possibilities for Matt to tie things together. Beau investigating anything for example or as a theory maybe Cad and Yasha are connected. Not that he couldn’t have done it otherwise (see Caleb and Nott) since Matt is such a good storyteller.

summary: On the subject of Kima, I’ve always imagined her as (young) Ferron, aka my favourite lesbian singer ever, except more roughed...
body:
On the subject of Kima, I’ve always imagined her as (young) Ferron, aka my favourite lesbian singer ever, except more roughed up, shorter, and battle-ready:

It also helps that Ferron has a ton of songs that I associate strongly with Kimallura, and that have a lot of very relatable lesbian moods. Also I love Ferron. 

(Sidenote that Ferron is just as handsome now as she was then!! Evidence:)

blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: You know what would be the best Legends of Vox Machina spinoff? One about how Allura and Kima’s party sealed away Thordak!
question: You know what would be the best Legends of Vox Machina spinoff? One about how Allura and Kima’s party sealed away Thordak!
answer: YES I WOULD LOVE THAT! You’ve got it all: thrilling odds, horrible tragedy (most of the party died!), blossoming young love between Allura and Kima, and then heartbreak when they go their own ways… I would cry through the whole thing.

reblog.comment: YES I WOULD LOVE THAT! You’ve got it all: thrilling odds, horrible tragedy (most of the party died!), blossoming young love between Allura and Kima, and then heartbreak when they go their own ways… I would cry through the whole thing.

Sideblog (main is fantasock)

Vriska stan Susie icon by cybercrimer

Deltarune spoilers

summary: The Angst potential of the mighty nein having to split the party trial of the take style and beau and jester have to be...
body:
The Angst potential of the mighty nein having to split the party trial of the take style and beau and jester have to be separated (let’s not think of the last time that happened).

And they’re about to part ways, jester is packing her things in their shared room in an inn, preparing to leave for a certain period of time while beau has to stay behind with Caleb for some library research and she watches jester pack and gets so anxious she has to go downstairs and start drinking even though it’s 9 in the morning and she starts talking to someone else in the nein (nott? Fjord? Yasha????) about like, love and stuff and something they say makes the final piece of the puzzle click in the back of her mind.

And before beau even understands why she’s doing it she’s bolting back upstairs to her and jesters room and jester is standing there, armor and items equipped and ready to leave and beau just. Stands there staring at her. They make strained small talk and exchange awkward goodbyes and beau is scared she missed her chance and is beginning to fill with dread as jester walks out the door and down the hall. But then, a loud THUD. A bag being thrown to the floor, followed by the sound of feet hastily walking then sprinting their way in beaus direction. Beau turns towards the sound, sight obscured by tears she hadn’t noticed until just now- there is a blur of blue hurtling towards her. Suddenly it’s all jester, holding her face in her hands and wiping away beau’s tears with her thumbs. Beau can see her clearly now, can see her own fears and desires reflected in jesters eyes, and she just stares. They remain frozen like that, for an immeasurable amount of time, hesitant and breathless. And then jester is kissing her, holding her close like her life depends on it, and for that brief moment, everything is ok.
